= Which help is desirable? =

At the current state the de.popforge.audio package is under heavy development. To avoid random contributions, we setup a wish list of functionalities, we highly desire to create a comprehensive code base for your audio experiments and applications.

= Wishlist =

  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Free_Lossless_Audio_Codec Flac Decoder Encoder]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Timestretching TimeStretcher PitchShifter]
  * [http://www.propellerheads.se/developer REX2 Decoder]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musical_Instrument_Digital_Interface MidiFormat]
